data.title: 25+ Senior Mechanical Engineer Solidworks Pro E Jobs, Employment August 9, 2024
data.meta_description: 27 Senior Mechanical Engineer Solidworks Pro E jobs available on Indeed.com. Apply to Senior Mechanical Engineer, Senior Mechanical Designer, Project Engineer and more!
data.text:
Design mechanical systems, equipment, and fixtures for material handling equipment.

Direct and coordinate construction, installation, maintenance, and testing activities to ensure compliance with specifications, codes, and customer requirements.

Integrate new technologies into equipment and processes.

Analyze product flow and perform continuous improvement activities for quality and throughput.

Troubleshoot mechanical systems and basic electrical troubleshooting.

Work with electrical and software teams to integrate with the mechanical systems.

Develop, document, and follow production processes.

Support maintenance and operations with repairs and redesigns to meet production goals.

Create and adhere to project plans and budgets.

Prepare specifications for the purchase of materials and equipment and the solicitations of contractors.

Qualifications & Skills:

Bachelorâ€™s degree in mechanical engineering or equivalent.

Proficient with SolidWorks CAD software.

Fundamental understanding of material strengths, dynamics, and manufacturing processes. Diligence in Engineering Design Principles with a strong aptitude in math and physics.

Ability to safely and effectively use hand tools such as wrenches, drills, saws, etc.

Ability to communicate effectively with operators and vendors.
